review_title: Highly Supportive, professional organisation ....great place to work!
job_title: Procurement Advisor in Salford, North West England, England
pros: Very supportive, genuine, well being focussed organisation who care about its employees. You are definitely not a number and have the ability to be recognised for your work and ideas, just go and make it happen. Love that they are a charity and I feel the organisation makes a difference, whilst remaining commercial. Flexible approach to working, really listening to the needs of the employees and not just prescribing a solution. Open door policy to speak to management colleagues of all levels. Great holiday pay, autonomy to manage your own workload focussed on objectives and continuous development is encouraged for all.
cons: Potentially limited routes to progression as a smaller organisation. Clear career path not available for all roles
